data.description:
**Skydive Sim - The world's most advanced Skydiving Simulator:**

**Skydive**

**Base Jump**

**Multiplayer**

**Airplane, Helicopter, and Balloon Jumps**

**Free Fall Control**

**Tracking**

**Realistic Canopy Physics with presets**

**Custom Canopy Settings**

**Cutaway and Reserve functionality**

**Front Riser Inputs**

**Swooping**

**Jet Packs**

**Wind Tunnel**

Welcome to Skydive Sim, an innovative and ultra-realistic skydiving simulator that sets itself apart from traditional VR games. Unlike others, where you can simply jump in and play, Skydive Sim offers a true-to-life experience that mirrors the challenges and thrills of real-world skydiving.

Mastering Skydive Sim requires understanding its intricate control mechanics, much like learning to skydive in reality. Take your time to explore our comprehensive tutorial scene and utilize our extensive collection of online tutorial videos. These resources are designed to guide you through mastering the controls and enjoying the exhilarating experience of Skydive Sim to the fullest.

Skydive Sim offers a range of activities. Free fall movements, tracking jumps, base jumps, and canopy physics presets with the option to set your own custom canopy! Canopy malfunctions with cutaway and reserve, front riser inputs, swooping and now even jet packs! With jet packs you can take off vertically and work on your canopy landings again and again without having to restart the level. Best of all you can experience all of it with friends from around the world, using our global multiplayer mode.

https://www.skydivesim.com

changelog.change_log: AI Skydivers are now in the main store in Beta.

Added ability to climb
Visual enhancements and minor bug fixes.

Radio tower in the mountains scene can now be used to base jump off!
Minor bug fixes and visual enhancements.
Fixed lighting in some levels
Added vegetation to Swoop Pond

Updated Line Twist Animation
You now have a variety of line twists. Some you can get out of and some you can't
Added Swoop Pond to Mountains environment
Fixed line twist bugs

Added Line Twists
Added Malfunction Chance slider in the Options menu

Added names to scenes in main menu.
Improvements to tutorial.

Added Front Risers capability
Added red color to toggles while holding front risers
Added Arrow keys to work under canopy for turns and flare in non VR mode
Adjusted dead zone for tunnel and free fall so we are more stable
Other visual enhancements

Added Wind Tunnel! You can now practice free fall movements using an outdoor wind tunnel in the Mountains Environment.
Minor bug fixes.

Added custom canopy settings. You can now dial in your own settings for canopy flight characteristics!
Added Field Of View Limiter. (Reduces motion sickness.)

Added Jet Packs! You now have the ability to fly around using Jet Packs. This feature allows you to go into Jet Pack mode after landing or during free fall. You can take off with Jet Packs after landing and practice landings and accuracy without restarting the level.
For instructions on how to use Jet Packs please visit our website: https://www.skydivesim.com/videos

Added controller vibration for virtual "Hi Fives" in Multiplayer!
Added Ride Along. With Ride Along anyone can enjoy the SkydiveSim experience without a learning curve. Think of it as a Virtual Tandem Skydive!
Tutorial graphics update to improve intuitive controls

Added coins to pick up under the canopy. (Can be disabled in the options menu)
AAD is now on by default and can be turned off under the options menu
Added age verification API

Added Metric units to preferences (set in the options menu)
Added ability to put Altimeter on top of the wrist instead of the bottom (set in the options menu)
Added malfunction animation if the user pulls hackie while in sit fly (Beta)
New Options menu graphics and UI
Added more sounds for realism

***Added landing assist. You can now activate landing assist to get real-time information on where you will land under the canopy based on current heading and inputs. (in beta)
***Added ability to turn on/off landing assist.
***Added more feedback for hand position in the tutorial while guiding the canopy through the rings
***Visual enhancements and optimizations
***Cutaway and Reserve functionality for non-VR (Steam only)

***Added landing assist. You can now activate landing assist to get real-time information on where you will land under the canopy based on current heading and inputs. (in beta)
***Added ability to turn on/off landing assist.
***Added more feedback for hand position in the tutorial while guiding the canopy through the rings
***Visual enhancements and optimizations
***Cutaway and Reserve functionality for non-VR (Steam only)
Visual enhancements and minor bug fixes.

Swooping feature is now in beta! Gain points as you swoop across the ground or while flying in close proximity to mountains and other objects. (You can only use toggles at this time)

Optimization for Quest 3 and new UI controller map to reflect the new Quest 3 Headset.

Added Usernames to players during multiplayer

Better overall performance and smooth playability in all scenes.

You can now change the Quality settings even in Quest standalone for clearer images. (Too high of settings may impact frame rates in some scenes)

Bug fixes and other enhancements.

* Swooping feature is now in beta! Gain points as you swoop across the ground or while flying in close proximity to mountains and other objects. (You can only use toggles at this time)
* Optimization for Quest 3 and new UI controller map to reflect the new Quest 3 Headset.
* Better overall performance and smooth playability in all scenes.
* You can now change the Quality settings even in Quest standalone for clearer images. (Too high of settings may impact frame rates in some scenes)
* Bug fixes and other enhancements.

* We are excited to announce the introduction of cutaway and reserve in this 2.0 version of SkydiveSim! In future updates, we will be adding canopy malfunctions which has been a very popular request.
* You can now turn off the front hackie and use the advanced hackie which is set up where the hackie is in real life.
* Fine-tuned Expert and Advanced canopies
* Longer and more natural  canopy opening animation
* BASE jump canopies now open faster
* Enhancements to the menus UI

This update enhances canopy physics and controls.
